**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. E.g. I'm always frustrated when [...]

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Use case / User story**
Help us understand who would benefit and how.
"As a [user type], I want [feature] so that [benefit]."

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions, features, or workarounds you've considered. This could include similar features in other tools or current workarounds you're using.

**Expected impact**
How would this feature improve your workflow? E.g., saves time, reduces errors, enables new capabilities.

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the feature request here. If screenshots would be helpful, please include them in this section to complement your description.
